# Package Description

This package is intended to eventually plot fatality analysis on a map of the US. Data acquired from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) was obtained as sample data for this package.

# Load Packages

```{r import libraries}
 library(fars)
 suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(maps))
```
